fields.label: Allowed Special Tokens
fields.tooltip: (Optional) Only applies if the unit is set to azureOpenAITokens. This parameter defines a collection of special tokens that are permitted within the tokenization process.

fields.label: Encoder Model Name
fields.tooltip: Only applies if the unit is set to azureOpenAITokens. Options include 'R50k_base', 'P50k_base', 'P50k_edit' and 'CL100k_base'. The default value is 'CL100k_base'.
